newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy offers bonds, certificates for auction.
newsitem.headline: Italy offers bonds, certificates for auction.

text.p: The Italian Treasury said it will issue three, five and 10-year fixed rate bonds (BTP) and seven year floating rate certificates (CCT) at its regular end-month auction.
The Treasury said in a statement said it would offer:
* 9th tranche 1/07/96 3-yr BTPs paying a 8.25 percent coupon.
* 9th tranche 1/07/96 5-yr BTPs paying a 8.25 percent coupon.
* 9th tranche 1/07/96 10-yr BTP paying a 8.75 percent coupon.
* 7th tranche 1/07/96 7-yr CCTs paying an initial 4.30 pct
The amount of paper offered will be announced on August 26.
Subscriptions for the CCT and 10-year BTP auctions close at 1100 GMT August 29.
Subscriptions for the three and five year BTP auctions close at 1100 GMT August 30
